answers.answer: If your boy friend is healthy , no high blood-cholesterol-diabetes-etc and keep maintaining , I dont think his sex capability will be a problem for another 10 years. At that time, you would also be entering menopausal periode with declining in sexual desire.

question: I am 39years old, my boyfriend is 60 years old,We have a great relationshipHe is concern that in the future he would not be able to meetmy desires.I am not worried, my relationship with him is solide and i am with himthrought the many challenges that may come.Can u please state clearly what his age would bring to our sexualityin the future.
title: sexuality and aging
